conversations.content: How many teddy bears are there in the image?
There are three teddy bears in the image.
What type of furniture are the teddy bears sitting on?
The teddy bears are sitting on a chair, which can also be described as a seat or a couch in this context.
Do the teddy bears have any clothing or accessories on them?
Yes, the teddy bears are wearing different clothing, showcasing a variety in their appearances.
What is the surface beneath the teddy bears?
The teddy bears are sitting on a blanket, which is placed on the furniture that they are seated on.
